snippet: Gay couples can keep getting married in Colorado, even though the state’s same-sex marriage ban is still in effect, a judge ruled Thursday.
abstract: Judge Andrew Hartman rules gay couples can continue to get married in Colorado, even though the state’s same-sex marriage ban is still in effect.
lead_paragraph: Gay couples can keep getting married in Colorado, even though the state’s same-sex marriage ban is still in effect, a judge ruled Thursday.

headline.main: Colorado: Ruling Spurs More Same-Sex Marriages
headline.print_headline: Colorado: Ruling Spurs More Same-Sex Marriages

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
